entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
Thanks, Andrea. This looks good. The Standards Council will get a report from Andre, prior to moving to public comment.
    -- Greg Newby (OGF Editor)

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Due date set to 03/04/2013
  • Status changed from AD review to initial review
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The document looks good to me, and is ready for initial GFSG review. I will put it on the agenda for the next GFSG call (March 4). Thanks UR-WG, nicely done! I'll read the document in more detail in the review period.

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

This is approved for public comment. Andre, would you create a PC tracker? Then, I can announce it.

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to final review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

The standards council discussed this on May 20. This will go to final standards council on the next telecon, prior to publication.

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

Hi Greg -- sorry, but I am not sure about the status -- was this ready to go?

Thanks, Andre.

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content: Approved by GFSG for publication pending correct header and publication information. Authors please provide source for this purpose.

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

This is approved for publication as GFD-R-P.204. Would the authors/editors please:
- update the header with the GFD #
- upload the final PDF
- also upload the source (i.e., a tarball/tgz)

Andre will then publish, and I will announce. Thanks, and congratulations on this publication.
-- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• File Usage Record 2.0 - GFD-R-P.204.pdf added
  • File ur-2.0_GFD-R-P.204.tar.gz added

I have changed the header and the status of the document with GFD-R-P.204.
You can find the .pdf file and the .tex source attached to this reply.

Andrea

entry.title: Editor - document #62: Usage Record 2.0 - P-REC
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to published
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

This is now published and can be announced.
